scripts.build:android: npm run setup-webpack-config && cross-env-shell VUE_CLI_MODE=production.android tns build android --bundle --env.production && npm run remove-webpack-config
scripts.build:ios: npm run setup-webpack-config && cross-env-shell VUE_CLI_MODE=production.ios tns build ios --bundle --env.production && npm run remove-webpack-config
scripts.debug:android: npm run setup-webpack-config && cross-env-shell VUE_CLI_MODE=development.android tns debug android --bundle --env.development
scripts.debug:ios: npm run setup-webpack-config && cross-env-shell VUE_CLI_MODE=development.ios tns debug ios --bundle --env.development
scripts.preview:android: npm run setup-webpack-config && cross-env-shell VUE_CLI_MODE=development.android tns preview --bundle --env.development --env.android
scripts.preview:ios: npm run setup-webpack-config && cross-env-shell VUE_CLI_MODE=development.android tns preview --bundle --env.development --env.ios
scripts.serve:android: npm run setup-webpack-config && cross-env-shell VUE_CLI_MODE=development.android tns run android --bundle --env.development
scripts.serve:ios: npm run setup-webpack-config && cross-env-shell VUE_CLI_MODE=development.ios tns run ios --bundle --env.development
